newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuelan oil basket rises 45 cts to $19.05.
newsitem.headline: Venezuelan oil basket rises 45 cts to $19.05.

text.p: The average export price for Venezuela's basket of crude and products rose $0.45 to $19.05 per barrel in the week to Friday from $18.60 on Aug 16, the Energy and Mines Ministry said.
The average price for the year so far is $17.08 per barrel, the ministry statement said.
Venezuela's oil export price averaged $14.84 per barrel last year compared to $13.23 per barrel in 1994.
The Venezuelan government has based its revised 1996 budget calculations on an average price of $15.60 per barrel.
